mapper.update: update t_ums_data_config f set configname=#{configName},DESCRIPTION=#{description},updatetime=now(),operatorid=#{operatorid} where f.dataid = #{dataid}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_ums_data_config WHERE dataid in
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT f.MENUID,f.TABLENAME,f.LINENUM,f.COLNUM,f.ROWS,f.COLS,f.sort,g.DATAID,case when f.HEADLINE is null or f.HEADLINE='' then g.configname else f.HEADLINE end headline,f.invisible,case when g.DATAID is not null then CONCAT(f.TABLENAME,f.MENUID,g.DATAID) else f.fieldname end fieldname,f.DESCRIPTION,f.DATATYPE from t_ums_th_config f LEFT JOIN t_ums_data_config g on f.DATAtype=g.DATATYPE order by f.menuid,f.LINENUM,f.colnum,f.SORT,g.DATAID
